pr_title: [Enhancement] Validation for Unreferenced Feedback of Programming Exercises

timeline.message: highlight that for unreferenced feedback score and text should be set
do not allow to submit/save unrefereced feedback for programming exercises
change logic and rename isValid method and add additional check for programming exercises
remove redundant check as it is checked in isEmpty

timeline.bodyText: Since this only evaluates to true if the lengths match, this can simplify to return that.length > 0 && that.filter(Feedback.isValid).length === that.length; which saves a tiny bit of performance by not filtering twice.
timeline.author: FrankeLukas

replies.bodyText: @FrankeLukas The check  that.filter(Feedback.isValid).length === that.length is needed to verify that ALL feedback items are valid. With .length > 0 it validets true when at least one feedback element is valid. :)
replies.author: fde312
